feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to ice pellets or snow in the evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
